alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:12PM MST until July 31 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN PIMA AND SOUTH CENTRAL PINAL COUNTIES... At 710 PM MST, a line of severe thunderstorms from Dove mMountain to almost Three Points continued to move to the northwest at 15 mph with damaging winds, frequent lightning and very heavy rains the major threats. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Catalina, Oro Valley, Marana, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, Saddlebrooke, Three Points, Avra Valley, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Tortolita, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Valencia West, Catalina Foothills, Picture Rocks, Dove Mountain, San Xavier Mission and Oracle Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
